name: Breaking the chain of Command
description:
CONTROLS:

WASD to move

Leftclick to attack

Rightclick to knockback attack

Rightclick + shift to warp attack

Space to warp

DESCRIPTION:

You're a robot killer assasin AI working for an evil organisation. You just realised that what you are doing is wrong so you go against the organisation to try and Break The Chain of Command. 

The game is somewhat difficult see if you can beat it :)
